input_text.Prompt:
Using the product keywords and product title, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Product title:
925 Sterling Silver Open Celtic Around Oval Blue Stone Pendant Necklace 18"- Nickel Free

Product keywords:
Pendant Size: 1.4x 2.8cm. Silver Chain Length: 18''
Weight: 2.4 g.
High quality .925 sterling silver
Natural Blue Topaz Stone
Packaging: Black Velvet Pouch
Matching earrings available. Search Amazon by KEA0007SIL

Product description:
input_text.Response A: This beautiful, open Celtic design pendant necklace features a natural blue topaz stone. This necklace is made of high quality, .925 sterling silver. The pendant measures approximately 1.4x 2.8cm, and the silver chain measures 18 inches. The necklace weighs 2.4 grams and is packaged in a black velvet pouch. This necklace would make a perfect gift for yourself or for someone special. Search Amazon by KEA0007SIL to find the matching earrings.
input_text.Response B: This beautiful 925 sterling silver open celtic around oval blue stone pendant necklace is a gorgeous and elegant accessory that will add a touch of class and style to any outfit. The pendant is made from high quality.925 sterling silver and features a natural blue topaz stone, which gives it a stunning and unique appearance. The pendant hangs from a silver chain that is 18 inches in length, which makes it an ideal length for most women. This pendant necklace is nickle free, and comes in a black velvet pouch, which makes it an ideal gift for any occasion. Matching earrings are also available, so you can coordinate your look.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
